title: Isolation of a cDNA encoding a potential soluble receptor for human erythropoietin.
abstract_text: Analysis of human erythropoietin receptor-encoding cDNAs revealed the possible existence of a soluble receptor lacking the transmembrane and cytoplasmic domains.
full_text_abstract: Analysis of human erythropoietin receptor-encoding cDNAs revealed the possible existence of a soluble receptor lacking the transmembrane and cytoplasmic domains.
